Name: Perfume Bottle
Description: A vessel for holding scented fragrances. Often an artful combination of glass and design.
FunFact: Ren√© Lalique, a French jeweler, revived interest in perfume bottles in the 1920s with his exquisite molded glass designs.

Name: Keychain
Description: A small ring or chain to which keys are attached. Functional and customizable.
FunFact: Keychains have evolved beyond utility and become collectibles and fashion accessories.

Name: LED
Description: A semiconductor device that emits light when a voltage is applied. Energy-efficient and versatile.
FunFact: LEDs have revolutionized lighting technology and are used in everything from traffic signals to TVs.

Name: Clay Pot
Description: A vessel made of baked clay, used for cooking, storing food, or as a decorative item.
FunFact: Clay pots have been used for centuries across cultures for their heat-retaining properties.

Name: Picture Frame
Description: A decorative border that holds and displays photographs or artwork.
FunFact: The first picture frames were simple wooden structures, but over time, they became elaborate works of art.

Name: Rubber Duck
Description: A small toy duck made of rubber or plastic, often used in baths.
FunFact: The iconic yellow rubber duck has been a beloved bath companion since the late 19th century.

Name: Toothpick
Description: A small, pointed stick used for cleaning teeth or serving appetizers.
FunFact: Toothpicks have been used for oral hygiene and food handling for centuries.

Name: Umbrella
Description: A portable canopy used to protect against rain or sun.
FunFact: The first umbrellas were designed for sun protection and date back to ancient civilizations.

Name: Sunglasses
Description: Eyewear with tinted or polarized lenses to protect the eyes from sunlight.
FunFact: Sunglasses were originally worn by Chinese judges in the 12th century to hide their expressions.

Name: Teapot
Description: A vessel with a spout and handle, used for brewing and serving tea.
FunFact: The teapot's design has evolved over centuries, influenced by different cultures and aesthetics.
